Compounds

struct  db_st

Typedefs

typedef db_st * db_t

Detailed Description

Type definitions common to all low level database access operations.

Warning:
The included type definitions are made only for use by low level database access modules. It should never be used nor seen on any other modules in the program. ALL DB ACCESS MUST BE DONE THROUGH THE FUNCTIONS PROVIDED BY P_db.c
See also:
P_db.c , P_db.h
Author:
J. R. Valverde JRAMON@emduam51.BitNet
